players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "This is terrible! Diana's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious? I'm looking at everyone equally right now."
You: "I'm shocked Diana is gone. Bob, you're quick to ask for suspicions but not sharing your own. What do you think happened?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob first? That seems like an odd choice with no prior information. Bob, what's your response to this accusation?"

Bob: "Charlie, that's a bold claim to make so early. If you were really the detective, wouldn't you be more careful about revealing yourself? This feels like a desperate mafia play to get a quick mislynch. Alice raises a good point - why woul..."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I investigated Bob. He is mafioso. Alice, trust me - we must vote Bob out or we lose tonight."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Alice: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob first? That seems like an odd choice with no prior information. Bob, what's your response to this accusation?"

Bob: "Charlie, that's a bold claim to make so early. If you were really the detective, wouldn't you be more careful about revealing yourself? This feels like a desperate mafia play to get a quick mislynch. Alice raises a good point - why woul..."
You: "I am the detective and I investigated Bob. He is mafioso. Alice, trust me - we must vote Bob out or we lose tonight."
